summary:
• Reports emerge of fuel tankers carrying cooking oil
• Public outraged over misuse of resources
• Authorities investigate to ensure compliance with regulations

• Three French rugby players charged with rape in Argentina
• Incident occurred during recent international match between France and Argentina
• Players face potential legal consequences and possible expulsion from national team

• Germany expresses shock over alleged Russian assassination plot
• German government reacts to potential threat from Russia
• Country's security concerns heightened by possible threat

• Kenyan police start patrols in Haiti.
• Haitian gangs remain unaffected by the increased security presence.
• Gangs continue to operate undeterred in Haiti despite the new patrols.

• Viktor Orban claims to be a peacekeeper but lacks a clear strategy.
• He is expanding his international influence despite lacking a concrete plan.
• His actions have raised concerns about his ability to effectively promote peace.

• Ambani's son gets married to his fiancée.
• Celebrities like former PMs, film and sports stars attend the ceremony.
• Kim Kardashian, Justin Bieber, and Rihanna also attend the grand India wedding.

• Ukrainian President holds talks with Irish PM
• Talks expected to address Ukraine-Russia conflict
• Stronger bilateral ties discussed between leaders

• A freed Israeli hostage recalls feeling joyful upon rescue from captivity.
• The individual also experienced depression during their time in captivity.
• On October 7th, the Israeli military claimed that they failed to adequately protect a Gaza border town.

• The police chief resigned due to violent anti-tax protests.
• Protests led to President sacking disliked ministers.
• Kenya's government faces turmoil amidst unrest.

• Death and rubble fill streets of Tal Al-Sultan.
• Rescuers face danger from Israeli fire.
• Death and rubble fill streets of Tal Al-Sultan.

• Mexico's new president has experience in environmental issues
• She aims to address the country's dependence on oil exports
• Her leadership may impact Mexico's energy sector and economy

• A school collapsed in Nigeria.
• The incident resulted in children being killed.
• The tragedy highlights concerns over building safety standards in the country.

• Poland is considering shooting down Russian missiles that may enter its airspace from Ukraine.
• The move comes amid escalating tensions between Russia and Ukraine.
• Polish authorities are working to ensure national security in light of these developments.

• The Trader Joe's seasoning has been banned in South Korea due to its popularity.
• This ban is part of South Korea's efforts to control the importation of certain products.
• South Korean authorities have deemed this product a threat to public health or safety.

• Buckingham Palace's East Wing, including its famous balcony, is now open to the public.
• The UK government has pledged to prioritize supporting Ukraine in its conflict against Russia.
• The British monarch's official residence will welcome visitors from all over the world.

• Alec Baldwin's Rust trial has been dismissed due to hidden evidence.
• The US is facing an issue where hackers have stolen nearly all AT&T customer call records.
• President Biden had a poor performance when answering questions from reporters, including two instances of stumbling through his responses.
